function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Efficient replication in upper respiratory tract","Impact":"Increased transmission and spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Public health measures, vaccination, and targeted interventions","Technologies":"Vaccines, air filtration systems, and contact tracing apps","People":"Public at large, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Less abrupt onset of symptoms","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals","Mitigation":"Education on symptoms, widespread testing and monitoring","Technologies":"Diagnostic tests, symptom tracking apps","People":"Public at large, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Predominantly exponential increase in transmission","Impact":"Rapid and widespread outbreaks of the disease","Mitigation":"Strict public health measures, travel restrictions, quarantine, and isolation","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance systems, and quarantine facilities","People":"Public at large, travelers","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
